personalInfo.name: Mohd Saddam Husain
personalInfo.title: Python Backend Developer
personalInfo.summary: Python Backend Developer with 5+ years of experience in building scalable APIs using FastAPI, Django Rest Framework, and Flask. Strong in Python, SQL/NoSQL/MongoDB, and backend architecture with a focus on clean, efficient, and reliable code. Experience with Microservices, AWS, Azure, and ElasticSearch.
about: I'm a passionate Python Backend Developer specializing in building scalable, high-performance APIs and microservices. With 5+ years of professional experience, I excel in developing robust backend solutions using FastAPI, Django Rest Framework, Flask, and modern cloud technologies. I am enthusiastic about writing clean, maintainable, and highly performant code that solves real-world problems.

I began my journey as a software engineer in 2018, and since then, I've continued to grow and evolve, taking on challenging projects across various domains including logistics, construction automation, restaurant technology, and e-commerce. I have hands-on experience with PostgreSQL (PostGIS), MongoDB, ElasticSearch, Redis, Docker, AWS, Azure Functions, and implementing microservices architecture.

I am a progressive thinker who enjoys working on complex backend systems end to end, from requirement analysis and architecture design to implementation, optimization, and deployment. I have successfully optimized SQL queries reducing API latency by 40%, improved search response times by 90% using ElasticSearch, and implemented real-time data synchronization using Kafka.

When I'm not in full-on developer mode, you can find me exploring new technologies, contributing to open-source projects, learning Data Science & Machine Learning, or solving Data Structures and Algorithms problems. You can follow me on LinkedIn and GitHub to see my latest projects and contributions.
quickFacts: Currently learning Data Science & Machine Learning
Passionate about clean code and optimization

responsibilities: Developed API for logistics domain using Python and FastAPI to facilitate product delivery to ships at sea in marine industry
Optimized SQL queries reducing API latency by 40% in high-volume logistics workflows
Participated in backend architecture decisions, improving service reliability and scalability
Conducted requirement analysis and documentation for upcoming features
Built reusable Python modules and utility functions to improve code maintainability and scalability
Created and tuned Elasticsearch queries ensuring efficient and fast data retrieval, achieving 90% increase in search response times
Developed microservice API using Django Rest Framework, integrating Elasticsearch with existing education domain application
Implemented real-time searching across diverse datasets, improving overall user experience
Implemented index mapping and settings to optimize search performance and relevance
Implemented real-time data synchronization from MySQL to Elasticsearch using Kafka Connect Maxwell
Worked on CAT Productivity software (https://vlproductivity.cat.com) for autonomous machine operation analysis for Grader and Compactor
Involved in planning, design and implementing various microservices
Created auto and manual Work area, Mission for grader and compactor machines using Python with Azure Functions
Implemented autonomous system in construction domain
Developed POC using Django to display real-time machine details
Created Docker images for application deployment in RPi server
Followed Agile methodology, participating in daily stand-ups and sprint planning
Built Savve Restaurant (https://strategy.savve.io and www.savve.io) REST API using Django Rest Framework for customized deals based on user dining preferences
Integrated Firebase to push notifications through the app, enhancing user engagement and communication
Created API for Myttle using Django Rest Framework for booking home services appointments (hairdressers, makeup artists, manicurists, etc.)
Wrote automated tests ensuring 100% correct functionality of the code
Built and maintained 100% of back-end REST API with AWS Services
Created API for admin dashboard to analyze reports and user feature usage
Implemented RESTful APIs for Intrastics using Flask Framework to show trade and analytics data for multiple products
Built extensive test coverage for all new features reducing customer complaints
Worked on data processing and cleaning with user-based role verification
Developed and managed Python Flask and NodeJS API for efficient data processing and cleaning for DGCIS
Implemented user-based role verification ensuring compliance with internal standards
Created Chatbot for manageSmart.AI using Dialogflow with webhook integration
Integrated chatbot across WhatsApp, Slack, Telegram, and Facebook Messenger
Created and maintained Python backend API for logging, analyzing, and capturing multi-platform chatbot interactions

achievements: Currently pursuing advanced Data Science and ML concepts
Learning statistical modeling, deep learning, and ML algorithms
Specialized in Computer Science and Applications
Strong foundation in programming and software development

productionProjects.name: Marine Logistics API Platform
productionProjects.description: Developed comprehensive API for logistics domain using Python and FastAPI to facilitate product delivery to ships at sea in marine industry. Optimized SQL queries reducing API latency by 40% in high-volume logistics workflows.

productionProjects.name: Education Platform Search Enhancement
productionProjects.description: Developed microservice API using Django Rest Framework integrating Elasticsearch with existing education domain application. Achieved 90% increase in search response times through optimized queries and index mapping. Implemented real-time data synchronization from MySQL to Elasticsearch using Kafka Connect Maxwell.

productionProjects.name: CAT Productivity - Autonomous Construction System
productionProjects.description: Worked on CAT Productivity software enabling machines to analyze work and operate autonomously without operators for Grader and Compactor equipment. Created auto and manual work areas and missions using Python with Azure Functions. Implemented autonomous system in construction domain.

productionProjects.name: Savve Restaurant Platform
productionProjects.description: Built Savve Restaurant REST API using Django Rest Framework for new and customized deals based on user dining preferences. Integrated Firebase for push notifications through the app. Created admin dashboard API to analyze reports and user feature usage.

productionProjects.name: Myttle Home Services Booking Platform
productionProjects.description: Created API for Myttle using Django Rest Framework enabling users to book appointments for home services including hairdressers, makeup artists, manicurists, pedicures, barbers, and body-painting. Wrote automated tests ensuring 100% correct functionality. Built and maintained complete back-end REST API with AWS Services.

productionProjects.name: Multi-Platform Chatbot Integration
productionProjects.description: Created chatbot for manageSmart.AI using Dialogflow with successful webhook implementation. Integrated chatbot across WhatsApp, Slack, Telegram, and Facebook Messenger. Created and maintained Python backend API for logging, analyzing, and capturing multi-platform chatbot interactions including popular questions and matched/unmatched queries.

productionProjects.name: Intrastics Trade Analytics API
productionProjects.description: Implemented RESTful APIs using Flask Framework to show trade and analytics data of multiple products providing best price recommendations. Built extensive test coverage for all new features.

productionProjects.name: DGCIS Data Processing API
productionProjects.description: Developed and managed Python Flask and NodeJS API for efficient data processing and cleaning. Implemented user-based role verification to ensure compliance with internal standards for DGCIS.

productionProjects.name: Real-Time Machine Monitoring POC
productionProjects.description: Developed POC using Django to display real-time machine details for construction equipment. Created Docker images for application deployment in RPi server.

testimonials.name: Abhimanyu Sheshashayee
testimonials.text: I have had the privilege of working with Mohammad Saddam at Shipskart. I was consistently impressed by his technical depth, problem-solving mindset, and commitment to excellence. Saddam brings a combination of hands-on expertise in Python, Django Rest Framework, and database technologies like MySQL and MongoDB. During our collaboration, Saddam demonstrated an ability to translate complex challenges into elegant, efficient solutions. His work was not only technically sound but also thoughtfully structured, ensuring maintainability and scalability. What stood out most was his dedication to writing clean, bug-free code and his proactive approach to improving processes. Beyond his technical skills, Saddam is a great team player. He contributes ideas generously, supports colleagues with patience, and fosters a collaborative environment where innovation thrives. His journey reflects both adaptability and a constant drive to upskill. I recommend Saddam to any team seeking a versatile back-end developer. He will undoubtedly add value wherever he contributes, bringing both technical excellence and professional integrity.

testimonials.name: Akash Jaiswal
testimonials.text: Saddam is a reliable, hardworking, and highly dedicated engineer with strong expertise in Python. He is honest, supportive, and always brings a positive attitude to the team. His professionalism and commitment make him a valuable asset to any project. I highly recommend him for any role that requires solid Python skills and genuine integrity.

testimonials.name: Subhjeet Kumar
testimonials.text: I highly recommend Saddam at Shipskart pvt Ltd . His solid Python expertise, eagerness to learn, and ability to deliver optimal, well-structured solutions make him an exceptional contributor. Any tech team would benefit greatly from his dedication and problem-solving mindset.

testimonials.name: Zaid Alam
testimonials.text: Saddam has a remarkable ability to dissect complex datasets and distill them into actionable recommendations. Their attention to detail and precision in data analysis were instrumental in helping our team make well-informed decisions. What sets Saddam apart is not only their technical proficiency but also their exceptional communication skills. They have a unique talent for translating data-driven insights into clear, concise presentations that resonate with both technical and non-technical stakeholders.

testimonials.name: Puneet Bhati
testimonials.text: Based on my analysis, Saddam is a top-notch Python developer who possesses exceptional skills in object-oriented programming. Moreover, their communication abilities are outstanding, making them a valuable asset to any team.

testimonials.name: Satyajit Barik
testimonials.text: Mohammad Saddam has a unique ability to juggle multiple tasks while maintaining the highest quality in their work. Their professionalism and work ethic are unparalleled, and they consistently go above and beyond to ensure that projects are completed on time and to the highest standard.
